title: Udemy Report: Which IT Skills Are Most in Demand in Q1 2024?
author: Megan Crouse
description: Informatica PowerCenter, Microsoft Playwright and Oracle Database SQL top Udemy’s list of most popular tech courses.
cntitle: Udemy 报告：2024 年第一季度哪些 IT 技能需求量最大？
cndescription: Informatica PowerCenter、Microsoft Playwright 和 Oracle Database SQL 位列 Udemy 最受欢迎技术课程榜首。
